Txt_Talk_RomariaHighroad_Out_MAIN_0_VOLU.Text: At last we have tracked down those banditi! First, we will make our way north to the village of Khoryv, before heading to the old tower.
Ah, scusi! By any chance, would you happen to have come from Aliahan?
Then it is as I thought.
Ah, but you are wary. Do not worry, I am an alleato<--->an ally.
We recently received a lettera from the king of your nation. He mentioned sending a warrior off on a great quest<--->you are exactly as he described!
I had hoped for some help tracking down our king's crown. You see, it was recently stolen.
As a result, the outpost that leads to Portoga is closed until further notice.
Mi dispiace for the trouble. I am truly sorry. I know this will not help your journey.
However, the outpost will be open soon enough! We believe we have found the hideout of the thieves. The crown will be returned in due course. Viva il Re!
*: Sounds like those ruffians are in the tower to the north-west. The one that's just over the mountains.
*: Sì, I saw it once when I made the journey to the western coast. It is quite the trek, let me tell you!

Txt_Talk_RomariaHighroad_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR.Text: *: Unfortunately, they've had to close the outpost on the way there thanks to some undesirable gang of hoodlums. Honestly...
*: Good things come to those who wait! Oh, have you not heard? The western outpost has reopened.
*: Now I can finally set off for Portoga. Business will boom once again!
*: Though, first, I'll need to get that magic key to pass through...
*: Banditi have been menacing these parts of late, robbing travellers on the road. Mamma mia... Truly, we live in lawless times.
*: The banditi that were causing all the mischief seem to have been driven off!
*: My friends guarding the outpost must be delighted.
*: Behold: the Romarian Road.
*: We guardiani are tasked with protecting those who use the road, and Romaria itself, from the monsters that plague the land.
*: Behold: the Romarian Road.
*: Beware when travelling at night. The monsters that come out after the sun sets are exceedingly violenti!
*: Oh, how I long for a glimpse of il Re! He is so affascinante<--->so fascinating to me.
*: Did you hear? We have a new ruler!
*: What? The old king has returned, you say?
*: Have you ever had the fortuna to witness a belly dance?
*: It is truly an elightening experience, sì?
*: Ah, such a shame! I heartily recommend it.
*: (whinny)
*: You'll never believe this: I saw a monster over by the fountain in town the other day!
*: I was so worried trouble might break out that I went to fetch the castle guards!
*: But it was gone by the time we returned to the fountain! Now, I know there was no way it could've seen us... Maybe our footsteps scared it off?
